text: António Tavares (born 31 May 1932) is a Portuguese former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre rifle, three positions event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Portugal Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon
title: António Tavares
